description: This Mediterranean Farro Salad with Spiced Chickpeas is packed with flavor, texture, and nutrients (and no animal products!).
keywords: Bean Salad Recipe, Easy Vegan Recipe, Grain Bowl, Vegan Salad
name: Mediterranean Farro Salad with Spiced Chickpeas
recipeIngredient: Freshly cracked black pepper (10-15 cranks of a mill) ($0.03)

recipeInstructions.text: To make the dressing, combine the tahini, water, lemon juice, minced garlic, cumin, cayenne, and salt in a blender. Blend until smooth. Set the dressing aside until ready to use (keep in the refrigerator for up to 5 days).

Rinse and drain the chickpeas in a colander. Heat the olive oil in a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Once hot add the drained chick peas. Sprinkle the smoked paprika, garlic powder, cayenne pepper (if using), and some freshly cracked pepper over top. Stir the chickpeas to coat in the spices, then continue to saut√© for about five minutes, or until the outside of the chickpeas are slightly browned and blistered. Season with salt to taste.

Chop the tomatoes, cucumber, and parsley. Place about 3/4 cup cooked farro in each bowl, then top with chopped tomato, chopped cucumber, spiced chickpeas, and a large pinch of chopped parsley. Drizzle the dressing over top and serve.
